name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AutoLogin SwissPost /w SwissId for TEST env

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: auto login functionality for password, sms code and email code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Login for KLP login page of SwissPost test systems

This extensions will automatically fill the password in the authentification mask. In the options dialog you define which password it should use.

As well the sms code is filled automatically, which can also be enabled or disabled in the options dialog.

Credits: Lurin, the PostIdea-decliner who inspired me to find other solutions.
